bike.description: High performance carbon fiber composite with mid modulus fibers, Dyad Plus T700/FRP lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters and ACE internal cables compatible with Di2, Carbon 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, Carbon PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin SST seat stays with hidden carrier/fender eyelets, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis ECO carbon composite fork, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, alloy dropouts with hidden eyelet
FSA integrated, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
Alex DC19 double wall alloy rims with CNC sidewalls, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Shimano Tiagra RD-4601 SS rear and Taigra FD-4600 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Tiagra ST-4600 Dual Control ST, 20-Speed
Tektro R317 alloy long reach dual pivot calipers with Shimano Tiagra ST-4600 STI brake levers
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo, gel inserts on top bar and "J" end plug
Jamis carbon fiber micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Glamour Open with Sytex cover and carbon steel rails
